name: Central Himalayan Rural Action Group
briefDescription: Chirag is a rural development organisation based in the Kumaun region of Uttarakhand in India. Since 1987, we have worked closely with communities on issues relating to forestry, soil and water conservation, agriculture, animal husbandry, drinking water, health care, education and skill and knowledge development of young people.

address: Central Himalayan Rural Action Group, C/57 Friends Colony
